snippet: Bowing to the gun lobby rather than the public, lawmakers kill crucial gun control legislation a mere 18 weeks after the massacre in Newtown, Conn.
abstract: Editorial criticizes 45 senators who killed bill to expand background checks for gun buyers, the last, best hope for meaningful legislation to reduce gun violence; contends only thing that matters to these lawmakers is blind and unthinking fealty to whims of gun lobby; calls on voters to vote 45 senators out of office.
lead_paragraph: Bowing to the gun lobby rather than the public, lawmakers kill crucial gun control legislation a mere 18 weeks after the massacre in Newtown, Conn.

headline.seo: The Senate Fails Americans on Gun Bills
